column5: Relax in the charming log cabins six miles south of Bandera, (between Bandera and Pipe Creek, Texas). There are two beautifully decorate log cabins. Kitchenette, washer/dryer on grounds, linens/towels/kitchen utensils provided. Dine in the Backyard Bistro when open and/shop in the Country Accent Antique Store. Both located on the property.
